mapper.select: /* SignUpDAO.selectIdSearch */ select a.user_id , b.user_name , b.tel1_no from tb_user a , tb_user_info b where a.user_id = b.user_id and b.user_name = #{user_name} and b.tel1_no = #{tel1_no}

/* SignUpDAO.pwdUserInfoCheck */ select a.user_id , b.tel1_no , b.user_name , a.user_email from tb_user a , tb_user_info b where a.user_id = #{user_id} and a.user_id = b.user_id and b.tel1_no = #{tel1_no} and b.user_name = #{user_name}

/* SignUpDAO.searchHakwonCode */ select a.hakwon_no , b.hakwon_name , a.master_user_no , get_user_name(a.master_user_no) as master_user_name , a.hakwon_code , a.hakwon_cate from tb_hakwon a , tb_hakwon_info b where a.hakwon_code = #{hakwon_code} and a.hakwon_no = b.hakwon_no
